title: [搬运]DitherDelightv0.4材质 将每个像素点发挥的淋漓尽致！
author: JedBoy_LD
txt_content:
本帖最后由 JedBoy_LD 于 2012-1-24 00:06 编辑 

DitherDelight
老D是在planet上看到的这个材质，表示非常喜欢那种将各个像素的表现都发挥到淋漓极致的手法，随不是高清，但是却是一个绝对好的材质，看到论坛没有多少1.1的材质，所以老D我做一次搬运工搬运过来和大家一起分享！
以下是原作者的发言，老D怕翻译坏了，所以放原文吧……
Hey guys, heres a texture pack Ive been working hard on for the last 2 weeks. It started as a revamp for my previous texture pack Lines & Layers, but this has evolved into a much greater pack that it deserves its own thread. So Ive discontinued that pack, and not looking back, as I want to dedicate as much as I can toward this pack.


Now obviously the theme to this pack is vivid colors/ dithered look. So I went with a limited palette of 5 colors for every block in order to acheive a good dithered look. There are hardly any blocks where i did not follow this rule.


So, Without further ado, Dither Delight!

原帖请看：http://www.planetminecraft.com/texture_pack/dither-delight-v04/
希望大家喜欢！

老D我也在此对大家说一句：新年快乐！万事如意！
